010package Ch07_MorphologicalFilters;
011
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.NeighborhoodType2D;
018import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryMorphologyOperator;
019import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryOutline;
020
021/**
022 * <p>
023 * ImageJ plugin implementing a binary 'outline' operation using either
024 * a 4- or 8-neighborhood.
025 * See Sec. 7.2.7 of [1] for additional details. This plugin works on 8-bit 
026 * grayscale images only, the original image is modified.
027 * Zero-value pixels are considered background, all other pixels
028 * are foreground. Different to ImageJ's built-in morphological
029 * operators, this implementation does not incorporate the current display 
030 * lookup-table (LUT).
031 * </p> 
032 * <p>
033 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
034 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
035 * </p>
036 * @author WB
037 * @version 2022/01/24
038 *
039 */
040public class Outline_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
041        
042        public static NeighborhoodType2D Neigborhood = NeighborhoodType2D.N4;
043        
044        @Override
045        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
046                return DOES_8G;
047        }
048
049        @Override
050        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
051                
052                if (!showDialog()) {
053                        return;
054                }
055                
056                BinaryMorphologyOperator outline = new BinaryOutline(Neigborhood);
057                outline.applyTo((ByteProcessor) ip);
058        }
059        
060        private boolean showDialog() {
061                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
062                gd.addEnumChoice("Neighborhood type", Neigborhood);
063
064                gd.showDialog();
065                if (gd.wasCanceled())
066                        return false;
067                
068                Neigborhood = gd.getNextEnumChoice(NeighborhoodType2D.class);
069                return true;
070        }
071        
072}
073
